topics.author: 505696b47f123b37e800effa

topics.body:
To the naysayers who tell me the show is going to crap:

Very well...good for you.
_I. Don't. Give. A. F*CK._

The only person who's going to tell me to stop liking MLP:FiM is me, and me alone.
topics.author: 536f7a11636872666e2d0000

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f88c6f6368723c684f0700#post_54f88c6f6368723c684f0700
it just doesn't feel like a kids show anymore

maybe it's just me, but the grand galloping galla episode was eons ahead of what they did in the discord one

and what youre saying about change doesnt make sense, i was stating that the show looks like it's going in the same direction as it has been going these past few years
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f88d2063687263cb640900#post_54f88d2063687263cb640900
I still liked what S3 did give us. Some of my favorite episodes came from that season.

And Twilight's princess status doesn't matter to me much anymore after the fact. Sure, the episode that it happened in was rushed as hell, but I feel the damage was made up for with S4 episodes.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f88dbf6368725ae8091100#post_54f88dbf6368725ae8091100
Odd, many people I know seem to hate S3 and S4 because it changed for the worse for them

And what's wrong with it not feeling like a kid's show anymore?
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f88dd863687262dd380500#post_54f88dd863687262dd380500
well i love watching kids shows, some are a fuckton worse that i remember as a kid (dragon tales, kipper) but others are still great

like caillou

shows have a certain charm to it when it's trying to appeal to kids, one that i've never been able to put my finger on, and if thats merged with even okay storytelling i'll watch it
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body: though to be honest i did think princess twilight was an abhorrent idea
